mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rosecrans, William Starke to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rosecrans, William Starke
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Nov 1 1861. By Telegraph from Camp Gauley 1 1861. No I cannot spare him & at this time an advance would not be advisable even with a much larger force WS Rosecrans Brig Genl 4D18pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rosecrans, William Starke
Camp Gauley
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
